ch0066_10_boss/0101_0701_02_10: As always, enjoy your time on my island, Pasio!
ch0066_10_boss/7101_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that in some regions, one can earn
prize money by winning Pokémon battles.
ch0066_10_boss/7101_0701_02_10:
With my social status, I’m not scared to lose money
at all!
ch0066_10_boss/7101_0701_03_10: Not that I should be, anyway! I never lose!
ch0066_10_boss/7102_0701_01_10:
Gholdengo’s body shines bright because it reflects
light...
ch0066_10_boss/7102_0701_02_10: But with these sunglasses, I don’t mind a bit!
ch0066_10_boss/7102_0701_03_10:
You might want to get a pair for yourself for
when you battle beside me!
ch0066_10_boss/7103_0701_01_10: Money should be spent, not saved!
ch0066_10_boss/7103_0701_02_10:
Hoarding money is pointless! Spending money
revitalizes the economy and creates new wealth!
ch0066_10_boss/7103_0701_03_10:
Ah... Was that perhaps too complicated a topic
for you? Bwahahahaha!
ch0066_10_boss/7104_0701_01_10:
My Gholdengo and Hoopa get along surprisingly
well.
ch0066_10_boss/7104_0701_02_10:
Hoopa seems to be a fan of Gholdengo’s gold
body.
ch0066_10_boss/7104_0701_04_10:
I wish it wouldn’t use its rings to summon me and
Gholdengo while we’re in the middle of battling 
every time it wants to play!
ch0066_10_boss/7105_0701_01_10:
What kind of event should we hold next to get
everyone on Pasio excited?
ch0066_10_boss/7105_0701_02_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Do you have
any good ideas?
ch0066_10_boss/7105_0701_03_10:
Budget is a non-issue! Don’t worry about the
money!
ch0066_10_boss/1701_0701_01_10: You’re extremely lucky to have run into me.
ch0066_10_boss/1701_0701_02_10: Here, I’ll give you this. Be grateful!
ch0066_10_boss/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t be stingy with it! Use it all up!
ch0066_10_boss/2501_0701_01_10: Pasio is always visually stunning, any time of day.
ch0066_10_boss/2501_0701_02_10:
We’ve been getting more tourists lately, and our
revenue has exceeded our overhead!
ch0066_10_boss/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ll need Rosa to keep working hard as Pasio’s
tourism ambassador!
ch0066_10_boss/2501_0702_01_10:
Tourism on Pasio helps support the economy of
my father’s kingdom...
ch0066_10_boss/2501_0702_02_10: I’m sure he approves of my success.
ch0066_10_boss/2501_0702_04_10:
it won’t be long until I’m worthy of acceding to
the throne!
ch0066_10_boss/2511_0701_01_10:
Money is the easiest power in the world to
understand.
ch0066_10_boss/2511_0701_02_10:
After all, you can buy most things you’d ever want
with money.
ch0066_10_boss/2511_0701_03_10:
On the other hand, if you can buy something with
money, that means it’s replaceable.
ch0066_10_boss/2511_0701_04_10: The things that are truly valuable are priceless.
ch0066_10_boss/2511_0702_01_10: Rachel, Sawyer, my friendship with my Pokémon...
ch0066_10_boss/2511_0702_02_10:
I never could have bought those—even if I had all
the riches in the world.
ch0066_10_boss/3001_0701_01_10:
Training in the morning? I can appreciate that, I
suppose. Carry on!
ch0066_10_boss/3003_0701_01_10:
Get ready to go out. I have a lot of tasks for
you to work on.
ch0066_10_boss/3005_0701_01_10:
You haven’t eaten dinner yet? Fine, come with me.
I’ll treat you.
